page.title: 04Child's Sunday on a farm
page.content: We got up at 6o'clock.We went downstairs and had breakfast(beans on toast).After we had a wash,cleaned our teeth and brushed our hair.Then I read a book to Gareth.Dad went out to do his work.Mum got the dinner and we put the napkins on the plates.We had fish fingers and chips.After we all went round the sheep with dad.Then we went to church.We sang hymns and the reverend said prayers and we stood round the font for the Christening.We went out to talk after.Lots of the people came to tea-we had crisps,flan,butterfly cakes,cherry cake and sponge.After tea some of them and I went for a walk round the fields.When we got back some people had gone.Then those who were left and us went for a walk.When we got back the last people went home.We all went to bed.
